## BammDepositChange type

Represents the change between two Bamm Deposit states.

**Signature:**

```typescript
export declare type BammDepositChange<T> = {
    depositTHUSD: T;
    withdrawTHUSD?: undefined;
} | {
    depositTHUSD?: undefined;
    withdrawTHUSD: T;
    withdrawAllTHUSD: boolean;
};
```
